control.visible: String.EndsWith(Control.GetLabel(881),color_transparent.png) + [Container.Content(movies) | Container.Content(tvshows) | Container.Content(seasons) | Container.Content(episodes) | Container.Content(sets) | Window.IsActive(tvchannels) | Window.IsActive(tvguide) | Window.IsActive(tvrecordings) | Window.IsActive(tvtimers) | Window.IsActive(tvsearch)]
control.label: $VAR[BingieMainFallbackTitle]
